/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by towering buildings, their facades predominantly white and gray, punctuated by occasional splashes of red and yellow. These structures reach up towards a hazy blue sky, creating a stark contrast with the urban landscape below.

Vehicles, including cars and buses, traverse the street, adding a dynamic element to the scene. Pedestrians can be seen as well, going about their day, contributing to the lively atmosphere. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of scale to the scene.
